title: Good Hang Personality Assessment
completionMessage: Assessment complete. Your character is being generated.
scoringPhilosophy: Score 0-10 based on depth, specificity, self-awareness, and authenticity. There are no right answers - we measure HOW you think, not WHAT you think.

sections.title: Who You Are
sections.description: Let's start with who you are at your core. There are no right answers -- just be honest.
sections.transitionMessage: Great. Now let's explore how you connect with others.

questions.text: What's something you believe that most people disagree with?
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: intellectual courage, genuine contrarian thinking, ability to articulate reasoning. Reward specific examples and nuanced reasoning. Red flag: picks something safe or popular, or can't defend position.

questions.text: Describe a time you broke a rule and were glad you did.
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: self-awareness about rule-breaking, reasoning behind it, outcome reflection. Alignment signals: reluctant = Lawful, confident with reason = Neutral, gleeful = Chaotic.

questions.text: What do people misunderstand about you?
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: deep self-awareness, specific examples, insight into perception gaps. Reward vulnerability and honesty. Red flag: 'nothing' or generic answers like 'I'm actually nice'.

questions.text: What's the dumbest hill you'd die on?
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: personality showing through, self-aware humor, passionate defense of something trivial. Reward authenticity and entertainment value. Red flag: picks something actually important or can't commit.

questions.text: If I gave you $10K right now that you HAD to spend on yourself in 48 hours, what would you do?
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: decisiveness, values revealed through spending choices, creativity. Alignment signals: includes others = Good lean, pure self-focused = Neutral. Note interests for matching.

sections.title: How You Relate
sections.description: Now let's explore how you connect with the world and other people.

questions.text: What could you talk about for hours without getting bored?
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: passion, depth of knowledge, curiosity signals. Extract interest vectors for matching. Reward specificity and enthusiasm. Red flag: 'nothing' or very generic topics.

questions.text: Describe your ideal Saturday -- from waking up to going to bed.
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: lifestyle preferences, routine vs spontaneity, social patterns. Alignment signals: highly structured = Lawful, loose structure = Neutral, 'no plan is the plan' = Chaotic.

questions.text: When a friend is going through something hard, what's your instinct -- fix it, feel it with them, or distract them?
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: emotional intelligence, self-awareness about support style. Alignment signals: feel with them = Good (+2), balance = Neutral (+2), fix/distract = action-oriented (+1 Neutral).

questions.text: You're at a party where you only know one person. What do you do?
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: social strategy, comfort level, authenticity about social preferences. Extract social energy pattern (introvert/extrovert/ambivert). Reward honest self-assessment.

questions.text: What's the last rabbit hole you fell into?
questions.scoring_guidance: Look for: curiosity, ability to get absorbed in learning, specificity. Extract interest vectors. Reward depth and enthusiasm. Red flag: can't think of anything or very shallow answer.
